actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

actions.subcommittee: SBA, the General Economy, and Minority Enterprise Development
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on SBA, the General Economy, and Minority Enterprise Development.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on SBA, the General Economy and Minority Enterprise Development

official_title: To clarify that certain greenhouses and nurseries that suffer damage in connection with a major disaster declared by the President on or after November 26, 1990, are eligible for loans under section 7 of the Small Business Act.

summary.text: Declares that certain greenhouses and nurseries which suffered substantial economic injury as a result of certain major disasters declared by the President on or after November 26, 1990, shall be eligible for loans under the Small Business Act.

titles.title: To clarify that certain greenhouses and nurseries that suffer damage in connection with a major disaster declared by the President on or after November 26, 1990, are eligible for loans under section 7 of the Small Business Act.
